channel.title: [PI] Bank Right Click
channel.description: When I click on a bank booth it does nothing. Only when I right click it and click "Use Quickly" then it opens the bank interface. I want it so you dont have to right click on the bank booth. Thanks ;)

item.title: [PI] Bank Right Click
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

Kind of like for npc clicks.
If you’re clicking the first option (assuming every needed packet is there), you’d just assign a action to the object’s id.
For instance, i believe to edit bank booth actions, it would be in actionHandler.java?

[code]public void secondClickObject() {

switch (objectId) {
    //OR SOMETHING ALONG THESE LINES..
}

}[/code]

Read full topic
